title: Cultore della materia - Internet of Things
description: Role of "cultore della materia" in the field of Internet of Things (IoT).

title: University scholarship
description: University scholarship at the Department of Pure and Applied Sciences (DiSPeA) in collaboration with the company Bax S.R.L and presided over by Prof. Lattanzi Emanuele entitled: "Design and development of technological platforms in the field of home automation"

title: Company internship
description: Support in the development of an industry 4.0-themed quiz application for IOS(IPad) used by the TEC department during internal and external staff training events.

title: Company internship
description: Development of a software for monitoring the working hours of employees and the progress of orders consisting of a web interface and an API Rest Node.js.
